data.message: I have never used the messenger app and certainly won't now.  Messaging within the FB app was just fine. Not being allowed to log out of an app, but rather having to delete and reinstall to log out is hideous, and that's just the tip of the ice berg.  Good luck peeps....I'm deleting FB app from my phone, because that app will be next..  There's nothing so important that it simply can't wait until I get to my computer.  Adios.......
